content:
I am working on FHIR and want to send HIV ORDER to some other organization. Which resource i have to use
1. ServiceRequest
2. DiagnosticOrder
3. CarePlan
andy code example

Please only ask a question in one stream at a time. Only post in a second place if directed to do so or if you haven't had a response after waiting a couple of days. (Question already asked in the #Orders and Observation WG stream)
